msg: Allow user to override velocity engine properties in TexenTask subclass.  TEXEN-14.

author: wglass
msg: Prevent exception due to race condition with simultaneous rendering of macros.  Fixes VELOCITY-566.

author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-2051. The TaskCommit thread should not die for exceptions other than the InterruptedException. This behavior is there for the other long running threads in the JobTracker. Contributed by Arun C Murthy
